group_1.textRight: We searched all night, but...

group_1.textLeft: We still...couldn't find Tsuruno and the others...
We haven't heard from any of them, either...

group_1.textRight: I'm bushed...
*Yawn*...

group_1.textLeft: Everyone looks exhausted...
I still feel like we should tell Tsuruno's family that@she's missing...

group_1.textRight: Right...
Let's leave the decision to file a missing persons@report to her father.
It's probably something to do with Witches and@Magical Girls,
so I don't know if there's a point in going to@the police about it...
But I don't want to keep quiet about it either...

group_1.textLeft: That's true...

group_1.textRight: However, we also don't want the police to@come to Suitoku Temple...

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, I'd like to keep Suitoku Temple out of this.
Maybe we can tell them Tsuruno is missing without@mentioning the temple.

group_1.textRight: By the way, Iroha...
This entire situation is giving me déjà-vu.

group_1.textLeft: You know, I'm getting the same déjà-vu feeling.@Or sort of this sense of nostalgia...

group_1.textRight: For real? Same here!
Me too...
What's going on, everyone...?

group_1.textLeft: ...Ah, I think I've got it...!

group_1.textRight: This place brings back memories, huh?
It's pretty close to Kosho Ward.
...So, why'd you bring us here, anyway?

group_1.textLeft: ...If we believe what the Tokime told us...
Whoever kidnapped Hikaru...
...will have harmed us as well as the Tokime@and the Union.

group_1.textRight: So you're sayin' it's an outside party.
That could be the Neo-Magius.@But they got taken down, didn't they?
There aren't any other teams working against us...

group_1.textLeft: No, but...
Kamihama City is not a monolith.

group_1.textRight: Oh, good point.
Not every Magical Girl in the city is part of the@Kamihama Magia Union...

group_1.textLeft: Meaning that amidst these Magical Girls, there is@one more who seeks the [textYellow:Kimochi] Stones...
And that would be...

group_1.textRight: How do you do?

group_1.textLeft: Good afternoon...
Oh?@My, I don't believe I've seen you before.

group_1.textRight: Yes, well, unfortunately, we are your enemies.
C'mere and lemme borrow your ear for a sec.

group_1.textLeft: Goodness, this is a bit of a predicament...
I see. Your friend from Futatsugi City has been@abducted...
I'm terribly sorry to hear that.@I don't know anything, though.
It is true that in the past, I sought the@[textYellow:Kimochi] Stones.
However...I've already withdrawn from that battle.

group_1.textRight: You expect us to buy that?

group_1.textLeft: You don't believe me, huh?@Then, are you planning to torture me?
If you are, suspending your search to fixate on me@would be a waste of time.

group_1.textRight: Don't worry about that~.
We're just gonna take you along with us for a bit@while we look around.
This way, we will be able to ensure Hikaru's safety@without interrupting our search.
I'll let ya off the hook as soon as you tell us the truth.

group_1.textLeft: Oh dear. Then you're never going to be able@to let me go.

group_1.textRight: So what are you going to do? Run away?
Stop resistin' already. You're up against three other@Magical Girls.
What are you doing? Are you even listening?

group_1.textLeft: No matter.
What's that?!

group_1.textRight: [chara:102401:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Wh-where?!

...Oi, there's nothin' over...@[chara:102401:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:102401:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock][chara:102401:motion_400][chara:102401:cheek_0][chara:102401:face_mtn_ex_050.exp.json][chara:102401:lipSynch_1]Hey, where'd she go?!

group_1.textLeft: Lady Yuuna!

group_1.textRight: You got here so fast! Just as always!

group_1.textLeft: The security cameras in this area are property@of the Kaharu Conglomerate.
And to miss your signals would make me a failure@as a butler to the Kaharu household.

group_1.textRight: I am most proud of you!
Heavens, they're catching up already.

group_1.textLeft: I'll get you out of here.
Please securely fasten your seatbelt.

group_1.textRight: I bid thee adieu, Futatsugi girls!
